history.proof: hauto use: u_conv0_2, u_conv0_1, u_conv0_0, u_conv0_4, mreconnaissance_ind, u_conv0_3.

exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "p", "a" and "t" leads to a term fun (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t0 : term) => u_conv_rec_0 p0 a0 t0 r which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "u_conv_rec_0" of type "forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "p0" : "preDTA" "a0" : "ad" "t0" : "term" "r" : "reconnaissance p a t" The 4th term has type "reconnaissance p a t" which should be coercible to "reconnaissance p0 a0 t0".

original: intros p a t r. induction r using reconnaissance_ind. apply u_conv0_0. apply H0.
